primary_person.name: Virginia Louise Roberts Giuffre
primary_person.summary: Sexually abused at 13 by Ron Eppinger. Recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell at age 14 while working at Mar-a-Lago in 1999. Lived as Epstein's 'sex slave' 1999-2002. Fled to Australia 2002. Key victim in Epstein cases. Founded non-profit 'Victims Refuse Silence' 2014. Sued Ghislaine Maxwell for defamation 2015.

associates.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
associates.relationship_context: Lived as his 'sex slave' 1999-2002. Had sex with her on 16th birthday with Ghislaine Maxwell.

associates.name: Ghislaine Noelle Maxwell
associates.relationship_context: Recruited Roberts at age 14 from Mar-a-Lago. Participated in abuse. Roberts sued Maxwell for defamation 2015.

associates.name: Ron Eppinger
associates.relationship_context: Sexually abused Roberts at age 13. She stayed with him 6 months. Age 67 at time.

associates.name: Prince Andrew
associates.relationship_context: Roberts claims she was abused by Prince Andrew. First met Easter 2001 per Sjoberg affidavit. Photo exists of Prince with Roberts as minor. Sex act in London affected 'foreign commerce'.

associates.name: Alan Dershowitz
associates.relationship_context: Named as abuser in Dec 2014 filing. Dershowitz helped draft NPA. Made motion to strike Roberts' remarks, went on media blitz calling her 'serial liar'. Attempted to sanction her testimony Feb 2015. In 2015 deposition implied she had sex with Bill Clinton (Roberts denies).

associates.name: Jean-Luc Brunel
associates.relationship_context: Roberts told Brad Edwards she was abused by Brunel

associates.name: Bradley J. Edwards
associates.relationship_context: Contacted by Roberts in 2011 when he was being sued by Epstein. Represented her in federal case attempts 2014-2015. Sent certified letter to Prince Andrew Jan 14 2015.

associates.name: Paul Cassell
associates.relationship_context: Co-counsel with Edwards attempting to add Roberts to federal case 2014

associates.name: Robert Josephsberg
associates.relationship_context: Filed suit against Epstein Sept 9 2008 (Jane Doe 2 v Epstein)

associates.name: Marie Villafaña
associates.relationship_context: Contacted Roberts March 2011 after Daily Mail story, expressed interest in case

associates.name: Wilfredo Ferrer
associates.relationship_context: Edwards sent letter Aug 20 2014 requesting consent to add Roberts as Jane Doe #3. Delayed response until Dec 23 2014 objection.

associates.name: Jack Scarola
associates.relationship_context: Sent certified letter to Prince Andrew Jan 14 2015 requesting cooperation. Letter refused by recipient.

associates.name: Bill Clinton
associates.relationship_context: Alan Dershowitz implied in 2015 deposition that Roberts had sex with Clinton. Roberts explicitly denies, says never participated or saw Clinton have sexual contact with anyone.

organizations.name: Mar-a-Lago
organizations.description: Had part-time job here at age 14 in 1999 when recruited by Maxwell. Father was maintenance manager.

organizations.name: Podhurst Orseck
organizations.relationship_context: Contacted this firm Sept 3 2008 to file civil suit

organizations.name: Daily Mail
organizations.relationship_context: Roberts sold story in 2011, they published parts

organizations.name: FBI
organizations.relationship: interviewed Roberts at length after March 2011 Daily Mail story

locations.name: Australia
locations.relationship: fled here 2002, settled, was living here 2008

locations.name: London
locations.description: Location where sex act with Prince Andrew occurred, affecting 'foreign commerce'

legal_cases.description: Sept 3 2008 received victim notification while in Australia, contacted Podhurst Orseck firm
Robert Josephsberg filed suit against Epstein. Settled out of court.
After March 2011 Daily Mail story, FBI contacted and interviewed Roberts at length

legal_cases.case_name: Epstein v Scott Rothstein and Bradley J Edwards
legal_cases.description: Roberts contacted by Brad Edwards who was being sued by Epstein. Told him about abuse by Prince Andrew, Maxwell, Brunel, Dershowitz, others.

legal_cases.case_name: Jane Doe #1 and Jane Doe #2 et al. v. US
legal_cases.description: April 2014 Roberts sought through Edwards and Cassell to join federal case
Edwards sent letter requesting consent to add Roberts as Jane Doe #3
Three months no response, Edwards wrote again with Dec 10 deadline. Government requested more time, finally objected Dec 23 2014.
Edwards and Cassell filed joinder motion publicly citing Roberts victimized by Dershowitz and Prince Andrew
Dershowitz made motion to intervene and have Roberts' remarks about him stricken from record
Dershowitz went on media blitz calling Roberts 'serial liar' who 'has lied through her teeth about many world leaders'
Prince Andrew spokesperson denied allegations without explaining photo of Prince with Roberts as minor
Jack Scarola sent Prince Andrew certified letter requesting cooperation. Letter refused by recipient.
Alan Dershowitz attempted again to sanction Roberts' testimony

legal_cases.case_name: Virginia L Giuffre vs. Ghislaine Maxwell
legal_cases.description: Roberts sued Maxwell for slander after Maxwell called accusations 'all lies'
Dershowitz implies Roberts had sex with Bill Clinton despite Roberts explicitly denying in her own deposition

events.description: After Daily Mail story, Marie Villafaña expressed interest

events.name: Named Dershowitz and Prince Andrew
events.description: Publicly named in joinder motion filing

events.name: Sued Ghislaine Maxwell

notes: Extremely detailed legal timeline with specific dates
Ongoing defamation suit against Maxwell as of document date
